tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE art_collectors (
  collector_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  collector_name STRING NOT NULL,
  email STRING UNIQUE
)

CREATE TABLE art_collections (
 collection_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 collector_id INT,
 title VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
 artist VARCHAR(50),
 year_created INT
);

CREATE TABLE art_pieces (
 piece_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 collection_id INT,
 title VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
 artist VARCHAR(50),
 year_created INT
);

CREATE TABLE collections (
    collection_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    collector_id INT,
    artwork_title STRING,
    artist_name STRING,
    year_created INT
);

CREATE TABLE artworks (
  artwork_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  artwork_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  artist_name VARCHAR(50),
  year_created INT,
  collection_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (collection_id) REFERENCES art_collections(collection_id)
);

CREATE TABLE exhibitions (
  exhibition_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  exhibition_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  curator_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (curator_id) REFERENCES art_collectors(collector_id)
);

CREATE TABLE loans (
  loan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  artwork_id INT,
  borrower_id INT,
  loan_date DATE,
  return_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (artwork_id) REFERENCES artworks(artwork_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (borrower_id) REFERENCES art_collectors(collector_id)
);
